name: Burg_37
culture_notes: Coastal Tongue dialect mixed with Island Creole loanwords
diet heavy on salted/preserved seafood and seaweed
tide-offering customs tied to safe passage and catches
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
notes: relies on irregular supply ships; winter storms isolate the outpost
small ritual lab is locally vital and politically sensitive
